reviews.name: Rahul Sharma
reviews.review: Absolutely amazing game! The Bollywood theme is hilarious and the gameplay is super addictive. Love the flying chappals!

reviews.name: Priya Patel
reviews.review: Great concept and fun to play! Graphics could be better but overall a solid game. Recommended!

reviews.name: Amit Kumar
reviews.review: Best endless runner I've played! The power-ups are creative and the bosses are challenging. 10/10!
